details.heading: Request an account
details.intro: You can request an account if you work for a Risk Management Authority or an Environment Agency team. We will use the information you provide to verify your request for an account.

footer.privacyPolicyIntro: Details of our Personal Information Charter can be found at
footer.dataCollectedQuestion: What of my data is being collected and how is it used? What is the legal basis for the processing?
footer.dataCollectedBullet1: Verify that you are eligible for an account
footer.dataCollectedBullet2: Ensure your account is set up with the correct access permissions
footer.dataCollectedBullet3: Allow us to contact you if your request is unclear
footer.dataCollectedBullet4: Your contact details will be used to manage your proposal, including contacting you with queries and updates
footer.dataCollectedStatement: Processing is necessary for the performance of a task carried out in the public interest or in the exercise of official authority vested in the data controller to enable Risk Management Authorities to bid for central government Grant in Aid funding.
footer.dataSharedQuestion: Who will my data be shared with?
footer.dataSharedAnswer: Your personal data will not be shared or disclosed to any other party outside the Environment Agency without your explicit consent.
footer.dataTransferredQuestion: Will my data be transferred outside of the EEA? If it will, how will it be protected?
footer.dataTransferredAnswer: The data you provide will not be transferred outside the European Economic Area.
footer.dataHeldQuestion: How long will my data be held for?
footer.dataHeldAnswer: Your personal data will be kept by us for as long as you require access to the service
footer.automatedDecisionMakingQuestion: Will my data be used for automated decision-making or profiling?
footer.automatedDecisionMakingAnswer: The information you provide is not connected with individual decision making (making a decision solely by automated means without any human involvement) or profiling (automated processing of personal data to evaluate certain things about an individual).
